title: 7 signs of seeing a sister’s marriage in a dream from Ibn Sirin, learn about them in detail

preview.html: A sister’s wedding in a dream is one of the blessings bestowed by God Almighty in the life of this world, and it is one of the favorite visions of some people to wish them confirmation of the lives of their brothers, and in cases of this topic we will explain that. Detailed interpretations from all sides. Follow this article with us. A sister’s wedding in a dream. Seeing a fortuneteller marrying her sister in a dream to a religious person means that good news will come and that she and her sister will be lucky. A sister’s wedding in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be freed from the problems and obstacles that he suffered from. Seeing The dreamer marries his sister in a dream, this is a sign that he will obtain a new, famous, and suitable job opportunity and will earn a lot of money from this job. If the dreamer sees his married sister’s wedding in a dream, this is a sign of his ability to overcome the difficult period he is currently experiencing and he will feel peace of mind and stability. Sister Marriage In a dream by Ibn Sirin, many dream interpreters have said many signs and clues about visions of a sister’s marriage in a dream, including the scholar Ibn Sirin. Below is an explanation of some of the signs and interpretations he said in this matter. Ibn Sirin interprets the marriage of an unmarried sister in a dream as an indication that she will be blessed with marriage to a good man who possesses many good moral qualities in the coming days. The dreamer who watches the wedding of her unmarried sister in her dream It shows her closeness to God Almighty. A sister’s wedding in an unmarried woman’s dream. A sister’s marriage to an unmarried woman in a dream indicates that she will obtain the highest grades in exams and will excel and advance her academic standing. Seeing an unmarried woman marrying her sister in a dream means that she will soon marry a man who has good qualities. Good morals. Seeing an unmarried girl marrying her sister in a dream symbolizes her ability to achieve many achievements and successes in her work. A sister’s marriage to a brother in a dream for a single woman. A sister’s marriage to a brother in a dream from an unmarried woman has many meanings and interpretations, but in points Below we will explain visions of brother marriage or sexual intercourse between them in general. Follow us: Seeing someone marrying his sister in his dream means that they will meet soon on a family occasion after a long separation from each other. If a man sees himself marrying his sister in a dream, this is evidence of his lack of love and appreciation for her, and he must try to change himself and get rid of this feeling towards her. The dreamer is tied up with her brother in a dream and feels tired and in pain, symbolizing his harsh treatment of her. A sister’s wedding in a married woman’s dream. The marriage of an unmarried sister in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life and a feeling of happiness and satisfaction with her husband. Seeing a married woman marrying her unmarried sister in a dream indicates To treat her husband well because he shares with her in all matters of her life. If a married dreamer sees her unmarried sister getting married in a dream, this is a sign that she has done many charitable works and is able to get rid of and end the crises and difficulties that she was facing, and that God Almighty will give her. Blessings and blessings

title: Learn about the interpretation of a single woman’s dream of driving

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a single woman: Driving is one of the dreams of many girls, and some of them can achieve this in real life and enjoy driving cars, but it may be strange to see a girl driving a bus or a plane in a dream. Overwhelmed by fear and controlled by turbulent emotions, we are interested in the following lines of our article with the interpretation of a dream about driving for individuals.Interpretation of a dream about driving a single womanWhen a single woman drives in a dream and arrives at a place she loves and knows, this indicates the satisfaction and stability that she will feel in reality, whether materially or morally. If a girl finds that she is driving her car and taking it to an unknown place and sees that she feels upset and afraid about it, the following crises may become many indeed and she cannot bear them and she resorts to some of those close to her to survive the evil and turmoil that surrounds her life. The girl is the place she wants without getting into problems and accidents, where most difficulties and bad things are far from her life and she enjoys calm. Interpretation of the dream of an unmarried woman driving by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that driving in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her personality and characteristics or her dealings with people. Real life is nervous and can cost her sadness. One of the signs of a girl’s ability to drive a car well is that she is someone who thinks when making decisions and does not rush at all, even if there are a group of cars and the girl chooses among them to drive, this means that she will get married soon and many people will come and think In choosing the good and ideal person among them. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds on the secret dream interpretation site from Google. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a single womanDream interpreters expect that the girl will have an accident while driving a car, which will not benefit her, because it is a strong warning of difficult and unpleasant news that You will reach it in the near future. At work or with her fiancé, and if she can continue on her way and the car does not suffer from a serious malfunction, then she can deal with this difficult and bad situation and solve the distress she was in. I dreamed that I was driving a car and did not know how to drive SinglesWhen a girl dreams that she is driving a car and does not know how She drives a car in reality, this is explained by the great and many achievements she has achieved in waking life, because she focuses on the goals and steps with her resolve and sets a lot. Alternative plans always make her qualified to reach success and success, and if the girl studies she will get great experience that pays her for great success and reaching excellence and the job she wants. Interpretation of dreams to fly a plane for a single woman. A dream about a plane pilot indicates that an unmarried woman is full of happiness and strength, and if the girl She drives a car without fear, so the lawyers explain that in real life she faces a strong heart without any pressure, and there are some tasks that the girl performs without any complaint, and some jurists confirm the wishes and desires of the girl that become verifiable if she

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing apple juice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about apples by Ibn Sirin: It is the man’s determination and what he seeks, and it is the same as the determination of the one who watches him. Apples are his profession, even if he is a plow, and seeing apples is his plow, and also apples for whoever sees them is the one who cares about them. And if he sees that he hit an apple, or eats it, or possesses it, because It undermines this enthusiasm as described, and it has been said that sweet apples are permissible food, and sour apples are forbidden. Whoever is thrown by the Sultan with an apple is a messenger who will be cursed, and the apple is an honest man close to the people. Whoever dreams of planting an apple tree grows up as an orphan. Whoever sees that he is eating an apple, then he is eating something. The world does not look at it, and if he picks it up, he will receive money from a worthy person with a good compliment. A numbered apple is a few dirhams. If he smells an apple in a mosque, he will get married. If a woman smells it in a gathering, she is famous. If she eats it in a familiar place, she will give birth to a good son. Biting apples brings goodness, peace and profit. On the authority of Hisham bin Abdul Malik, he saw in front of the caliphate as if he had struck nineteen and a half apples, so he recounted his visions at the crossing. He said to him: He reigned for nineteen and a half years, and immediately after that he succeeded him. Scientists interpreted the dream of apples in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. He interpreted the dream of seeing apples and said: Apples from both sides: If one sees a green apple, this indicates a child, and if it is red, then it is a blessing on the part of the king. If it is white, then it is a benefit in trade, and if it is yellow or sour, then it indicates sickness and weak strength. Whoever sees that it Divide an apple into two halves, this indicates the division of two partners. Whoever dreams that he picks a red apple from the tree and eats it, then he will have a daughter. Whoever witnesses that they gave him sour apples shows his enmity, and if they are sweet, he shows his friendship. Interpretation of a dream about seeing apples It is said that a dream about apples indicates The dreamer’s insistence on his work and industry. If he is a merchant, then it indicates his trade, and if he is a farmer, then he shows his agriculture, and if he is a seedling, then he shows the hypocrisy of his goods, and in this regard all crafts. And whoever sees that they are apples, and eats from them, shows his determination to work what Dam is eating, and it also shows that he will get what he wants. In short, seeing apples is interpreted through eight aspects: child, benefit, illness, slave, money, government, dream of seeing, and absent and present news. They said that anyone who sees that he has an apple or If he carries it or eats from it and participates in something, he will get it as long as he is afflicted. Whoever dreams that he is afflicted by an apple of any color, he will be born and then a similar one will be born. Perhaps the affliction of the apple was an affliction of money, and it is said that the number of apples indicates the number of years for the one who wants the state. Because Hisham bin Abdul Malik saw before becoming Caliph that he had struck nineteen and a half apples, so his visions were interrupted, so he issued the governor’s order for nineteen and a half years, and the order was. As he put it. Perhaps seeing an apple is interpreted as a result of what a person hopes for in agriculture or trade. It was said: The apple is expressed in dirhams as ten dirhams or from one hundred to a thousand. And whoever sees that he is picking apples, he will receive money from a person worthy of good praise. Whoever dreams that he is picking apples from another tree, then he is entrusted with something and will not fulfill it. Interpretation of a dream about apples

title: Interpretation of seeing a Saudi National Day party in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a Saudi National Day party in a dream. A person often dreams during his sleep, and perhaps the most important of them is the dream of national celebrations. It is one of the dreams that require an accurate and complete interpretation, as the world of dreams can convey some direct and correct messages to the viewer because they relate to reality in some way, Encyclopedia Net presents the results of seeing the Saudi National Day party in a dream. The national anthem of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream. The dream of the national anthem of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream. Its meanings and interpretations vary between good and evil, and this is due to the state in which the dreamer is, as well as all the events that appear in this vision. . Interpretation of a dream about the Saudi national anthem in a dream: Seeing the national anthem of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream symbolizes one’s status in his homeland and his pride in it. It also indicates the pride and dignity that the people enjoy and that they are proud of their relationship with this country and this great land. Whoever sees that he is singing the anthem The National Day indicates that the dreamer is enjoying victory. Interpretation of a dream about celebrating the National Day of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream. The National Day of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia is considered one of the days of great importance for the citizens of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, as a series of events are held on this day that are planned a few days in advance, with the aim of Express your belonging and love for it. The state, apart from declaring an official holiday during this day, in all public and private sectors, and the following is the interpretation of the dream of celebrating the National Day of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream celebrating the National Day and is an employee, this symbolizes increasing his rank and obtaining a position. High. It may indicate his return home in the coming days. Celebrating the National Day also symbolizes the spread of security in the country. Seeing a national holiday in a dream. Celebrating holidays and occasions in a dream symbolizes different things, and it should be noted that it is one of the visions that is strongly accepted by jurists. The following is an interpretation of seeing the National Day in a dream: Celebrating the National Day in a dream indicates that a person feels comfortable in his place without having to leave his homeland. Seeing the celebration of the National Day and seeing children celebrating in the streets symbolizes the happiness and joy of children. It symbolizes the person’s dedication and love for his job or His work. Seeing a Saudi National Day party in a dream is considered a praiseworthy vision, especially if the atmosphere is happy, as it indicates a change in the situation, good circumstances, and change for the better.

title: The 25 most accurate interpretations of life in Fino by senior interpreters

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of seeing live fino in a dream for advanced researchers. Bread dreams are many and different. Some of us dream of brown bread, others see white bread, and others see live fino, and this is the topic of our article today. Pregnant and others. Interpretation of a dream about living a luxurious life: Seeing a fine in a dream is considered one of the best visions that a person has ever dreamed of because it is a sign of the prosperity of his life. The Most Merciful will erase it and replace it with much better conditions. Among the interpretations of a loaf of fino in a dream is that it may indicate that the dreamer is on the path of deception and impure money, especially if he touches it and finds it warm, but if he dreams that he is carrying a loaf of fino in his country. She ate from that as a metaphor for the strength of his body. The jurists confirmed that seeing fine bread gives a positive sign if it appears in the dream and is cooked, because in this case it indicates three interpretations. The first is that it indicates the dreamer’s Islam, his emulation of the Messenger, and his love for the People of the House, and he is also adept at performing duties and Sunnah. As stated in the Qur’an and the Hadiths. The second interpretation reveals his pure life free of sadness. The third interpretation confirms that the dreamer will learn a branch of science and delve into it until he understands it well. It is not good for him to see Fino while it is solid and the dreamer cannot chew or eat it, and it is also undesirable. . The dreamer to eat, which is a piece of dough, that is, before entering the fun. If the seeker of knowledge sees that he has a large number of living fines and gives to all the poor people he saw on his way in the dream, this means that he will obtain all the certificates that he aspires to obtain. Among the unpleasant visions is the dreamer’s dream of having A dead man known for his bad behavior gave him a loaf of bread, and this vision has three symbols and repercussions. The first symbol indicates that the dreamer was tempted and fell into sedition and heresy, which became his doctrine in life, and he did not stop following it, but rather called on men to do so. The second symbol shows that the dreamer’s wife will die if In the waking state, she was suffering from various health problems. The third sign: He claims that his relationship with God will collapse because his faith in religion is weak and he must delve deeper into it to save himself from disbelief and destruction. It is not desirable in a dream for the dreamer to see mold on a loaf of bread, because this indicates monitoring his behavior and movements. By a group of people in his life, in addition to mixing with hypocrites and dealing with innocence and deception. He should pay attention to the vision because it warns him that he is surrounded by harmful people, and even if he does not intend to be careful, he will soon fall prey to them. A loaf of bread falling from the dreamer’s hand and falling to the ground or into the fire is a sign of the temptations that will soon befall him, and the dream has another meaning, which is that one His wives are either his wife or one of them. One of his daughters, and perhaps his sister, will become morally and religiously corrupt or die soon. Whoever eats bread while it is still dough that is not ready to eat, this is a fever that will cause him to stagnate in his house for a while. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. What is the interpretation of a dream about a live Finos for singles? Singles see a live Finos in two cases: the first case

title: Interpretation of a dream about getting furniture at home in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of getting furniture in the house in a dream, we may search for the interpretation of the dream of getting furniture in the house in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of getting furniture in the house in a dreamAnyone who dreams of taking home furniture can indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life at that time If there is a personal opinion that he took home furniture in a dream, this may indicate happiness and new events that may occur in the visionary’s life during that period. Buying gold-plated furniture in a dream may indicate some fears and problems that the visionary faced during that period. If a person sees himself changing the furniture of the house in a dream, this may indicate the livelihood that the dreamer will receive in the coming days, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of spices or spices in a dream, which are spices or a group of different types of spices, which are usually added to many different types of foods to give a distinctive taste and appetite, and there are many spices, including turmeric, rosemary, cumin and many other delicious varieties. Today we look at a group of opinions and interpretations of the great Arab interpreters who received the vision of spices in a dream, as spices can symbolize kindness, optimism, good luck and profit and can indicate bad luck and misfortune, or seeing black pepper indicates financial losses, especially if a person sees this vision and we will learn about it in this article. Interpretation of a dream of spices by Nabulsi: Seeing spicesAs Nabulsi explains, it indicates the sudden death of children. Seeing spices in a dream also indicates intermittent trade. Seeing spices in a dream also indicates the absence of profit from trade. Spices in a dream indicate the disappearance of happiness. Spices in a dream indicate separation between spouses. Seeing spices in a dream means that you will get a prestigious position, but you will lose it. Seeing spices in a dream indicates money in reality. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing saffron in a dream Interpretation Dream of spices by Ibn Shaheen: Seeing spices, as interpreted by Ibn Shaheen, symbolizes anxiety, distress and sadness. A look at spices indicates an unsustainable trade. Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees red pepper in a dream, this vision may indicate that she is suffering from stress and tension. While she sees food being cooked with pepper, this vision indicates that she will face problems, difficulties and disagreements with her husband. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see cloves in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a single woman: A girl who is not married when she sees red pepper in her dream, but it is cold and delicious. Seeing that she is buying pepper can mean that her marriage is close to someone she loves and she will be happy with him. However, if she sees that she is eating spices, this vision may indicate that she is a beautiful and good-looking girl. See also: Interpretation of a dream to see cumin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees that she is eating green pepper, this vision may indicate her good and abundant livelihood, and it also indicates the stability of her marital life with her husband. Seeing pepper indicates Green to the near birth of a pregnant woman. It is easy to give birth and give birth to a boy. But if you see red pepper, this vision may indicate the difficulty of childbirth, and his birth will be difficult. The emergence of a latent condition can mean that everything you want will come true. Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a man: When a person sees a latent condition in his dream, this vision shows the achievement of the goals and ambitions he wants, and this vision also shows the emergence of happiness, goodness, success and distinction and has a job opportunity through which the highest positions are obtained. And if you see the spices, it is

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and praying according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and praying: Seeing yourself touching the Kaaba and praying is one of the good dreams that enter the heart of whoever sees it with pleasure, and it is interpreted according to the events mentioned in the dream, the condition of the dreamer, and all the details related to the vision of touching the Kaaba and praying will be presented to you in the next article.Interpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and prayingInterpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and praying in The dream has many interpretations and contents, the most important of which are: Seeing yourself touching the Kaaba for the dreamer indicates a safe life of peace, peace of mind, and happiness. If one dreams that he is touching the Kaaba and praying, then the difficult period he is currently going through will end and the financial situation will recover soon. Whoever sees himself Holding the Holy Kaaba and crying, this is evidence that God Almighty has repented, erased his sins, and is pleased with him. Interpretation of the dream of touching the Kaaba and supplication by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained many meanings and connotations related to touching the Holy Kaaba in a dream, the most important of which are: If someone sees in a dream that he is calling out to the Holy Kaaba. In a dream, this is a clear indication of his ability to reach the dreams and aspirations that he has long sought to achieve in the near future. If the dreamer is single and sees in a dream that he is touching the Kaaba in supplication, then he will enter the golden cage in the near future. If a married woman sees in a dream that he is touching the Kaaba in supplication, then he will enter the golden cage in the near future. Her dream is that she is touching the Kaaba and praying to God with supplication and crying, for God will give her good news that will relieve her of her distress, end her sorrows, and ease her circumstances soon. Interpretation of the dream of touching the Kaaba and praying to Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq explained many interpretations related to the dream of touching the Kaaba and praying, such as: If a person sees in a dream That he is walking in the direction of the Kaaba, then this vision is promising and indicates his good state of affairs and that he is on the right path and his commitment to performing religious duties in reality. Interpretation of a dream about someone standing on top of the Kaaba in a dream symbolizes the corruption of his life and the pursuit of desires. Interpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and praying for an unmarried woman to dream Touching the Holy Kaaba in a separated girl’s dream symbolizes that she is a good girl and has many good qualities, which leads to the love of those around her. If a virgin sees in her dream that she entered the Kaaba in a dream, this is a sign of the approaching date of her marriage to a wealthy young man from a prominent family with a high status. In society. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the Kaaba for a single woman. If the dreamer is single and dreams that she is kissing the Kaaba in a dream, then this dream is praiseworthy and indicates that she is following the example of the Messenger and following his path in reality. The dream of kissing the Kaaba in the dream of a girl who has not been married before indicates that she will go to perform an obligation. Hajj in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about touching the Kaaba and praying for a married woman. If the dreamer gets married and is late in giving birth, and she sees in her dream that she is touching the Kaaba and praying, then this vision carries within her good news of her upcoming pregnancy. A dream about touching the cover of the Holy Kaaba in a woman’s dream indicates a luxurious life most likely. It entails the expansion of livelihoods, the abundance of gifts and benefits, and the abundance of money. Interpretation of a dream about touching the

title: What are the signs of the eye in the hair?

preview.html: Eye marks on the hair are considered signs of beauty for women and men, as they draw attention to both genders, as there are many things that affect the hair, such as hair loss and weak hair follicles, where the hair is impressive and exposed to damage. Envy and the eye, as the infection of the hair by envy and the eye has indicators and signs, as we will learn in our article about the signs of infection of the hair in the eye or envy. Signs of the eye in the hair. In this context, we will learn about the signs that indicate the infection of the eye, including the following: Hair suffers from loss. Severe hair loss, even when taking anti-hair loss medications. The condition of the hair changes from smooth as silk to rough. Insects spread extensively in the hair. Hair loss from the front of the head, such as baldness. Various symptoms and signs may occur, such as numbness in the hands and feet, chronic headaches with nausea, And irregular heartbeat. Since envy is one of the matters mentioned in the Holy Qur’an that takes away blessings from others, it is considered one of the signs of the eye in the hair that may lead to its loss. Ways to avoid eye hair damage and envy. There are many ways to avoid hair envy, including the following: to ask Whoever looks at your hair with the remembrance of God and says, God willing. Continuing to recite the dhikr and muzat. Reciting Ayat al-Kursi and reciting Surah Al-Baqarah. Read the legal ruqyah to save you from Satan. Hiding the blessing of God and not showing it to the public. Do not show your hair in public places. Signs of legal hair healing from Rokea Sharia Rokea is considered one of the methods used in treatment and getting rid of envy or the evil eye, and God can complete the recovery of the envy patient, as he shows positive symptoms, the most important of which are the following: Hair does not get tangled when combing. Vegetation and hair growth in bare spots. Return to Normal pre-exposure routine. Sweating and yawning. Get rid of bad mood and fluctuations. Disappearing scenes and disturbing dreams. Read alsoHere we reach the conclusion of our article in which we answered the signs of the eye in the hair, where we mentioned the signs that appear on the hair of the envious person, the most important of which is exposure to serious loss and ways mentioned. To avoid envy and the symptoms that occur when you recover from envy, using legal rukia is one of the best ways to treat envy.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about cooking in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Many of us dream that we are cooking and we begin to wonder about the interpretation and meaning of this dream and whether it is something worthy of praise or something worthy of blame... In this article we will present the interpretation of seeing a dream about cooking in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of a dream about cooking in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing cooking in a dream by Ibn SirinThe vision of cooking In a dream, it indicates a lot of money and livelihood. Seeing cooking in a dream indicates instinct and intelligence. A person who sees himself in a dream enters the kitchen and starts cooking and lighting a fire indicates that the person will get a big job in the future. The symbol of eastern cooking in a dream indicates a close marriage. Seeing yourself cooking in a dream It indicates the success of insight and obtaining a certificate. Interpretation of a dream about cooking in a dream and its meaning. Seeing cooking in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman cooking ripe food in a dream means pregnancy. If we see that you are cooking in a dream for a married woman, it means that the woman is rich and has a lot of money. If you see rice cooking in a dream For a married woman, it means that she has moved to a new home. Seeing cooked meat in a dream indicates good money and abundance. Seeing that a married woman is cooking delicious food in a dream symbolizes family happiness. Seeing cooking in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman cooking herself in a dream indicates an approaching date. Birth: If a pregnant woman sees herself cooking rice in a dream with meat added, this indicates that she will spoil the male child, God willing. If you dream of a pregnant woman cooking for you, this means the birth of a male child. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cooking hibiscus in a dream, this is an indication of Giving birth to a child: To dream of a pregnant woman cooking soup indicates the birth of a girl. Seeing cooking in a woman’s dream. If a girl sees a pot of food in a dream, this means that she has reached adulthood and will get married in the near future. If a woman sees a pot that is starting to cook delicious food in a dream, this indicates That she is completely ready for marriage. Seeing cooking in a girl’s dream indicates marriage. If you see a woman cooking for you in a dream with a pot, this means that her marriage will be imminent. Seeing that a woman is cooking meat in a dream, the pot symbolizes wealth and abundant money. To see a woman cooking chicken in A dream about a pot, this indicates her happy marriage in the near future. Seeing a kitchen in a dream for a girl with a pot indicates the marital home. Seeing cooking utensils in anyone’s dream indicates people very close to the girl who attended her wedding. Seeing cooking in a man’s dreamSeeing a man cooking in a dream means Success in his planned project. If one sees in his dream that he is cooking delicious food, it means that he will get married in the near future. Seeing cooking in a dream A dream about cooking may indicate the dreamer’s ability and politeness in speech. If one sees the kitchen in his dream, it symbolizes intelligence and intelligence. If one sees the kitchen Chinese in his dreams, then this is a sign that he has acquired a new business or trade. If one sees French cuisine, then this is a sign of travel. Seeing a kitchen in a dream indicates a
